post.body: Then just say, I think I can, I think I can
just keep that thought as you puddle through the pool on the way to your car. keep saying, nice hot chocolate , hot chocolate, hot
Boy you work late and yet I see your tweets early in the AM are you working from home too?
YesI follow it. I can't seem to record my book right. They want me to try again. Ugh, it's this darned old memory.
Thank you for following me, Oh my grandson would love you. Oh and you look interesting too :)
You know when I go to the library I become a compulsive borrower. Even though I have a shelf of unread books at home. I borrow more.
I hope you mean they are just rained out and not closing the place for good
Nice to see you here!
Tons of noise comes from Kunia. The rain solved the problem. it's washing the road out. Try that w/Prince ah, but you need rain
You'd better take into account the delivery time. I'm still waiting on a book I orderd Oct.20th.
is helping me uncover relevant people in my network I had been missing out on. Check him out! http://mrtweet.net?c=9
Thank you for choosing to follow me Josh and I enjoyed the Blagojevichâ€™s Daily Show Interview on your blog
yes, I love it when someone else is gramatical ly challanged. Your right, my daughter says the same thing. Leave the house!
I've been here 43 years and have not been to 1//4 the places you have.
do you have different people on each account?
You would have circled Oahu in that time. In heavy traffic.
http://bit.ly/4r9bGU I don't know how old your kids are but this site has lots of activities to go to for Christmas
it's faster then using the dictionary and it gives you option. but of course a spell check would be better.
and now the fun begins. Or boredom or pulling your hair out. your choice.
thank you, I'm going to check it out. I love Won Ton min. Is that the park you park the rats in?
I'm never logged out of my blogger but since I use two different addresses it still ask me to log in.
Well, thank you so much, I'll look forward to it.
I was so glad to see your slip. I misspel so many words without a spell check on tweetDeck
How did you get back in?
Terra, I can count the number of people who have said "Merry Christmas" to me on one hand. And Christmas is 6 days away. Sad!
That story is so f*cked. That is why our nation is so stressed out. We have no recorse. Police are my worst nightmare.
The government actually help the people? It's the big cats that put them in office, we just think we do.
Hey, if my employees had access to a TV I would make sure it was darts too! They should know what bores people to death.
at least you got your check back.
a dachshund named Wee Wally. I just adored him. Max the new dog is your guess is as good as mine. http://twitpic.com/yh9j
Where do you go on gmail to delete jpgs I have a ton of them too.'
I almost had 1 when I was staying w/ my brother in Holland. He was ready but I was not. Very nice man though. Looking forward 2 ...
Hey, Happy New Year Joan, I'm just going to have a plain hamburger. Not as good as what your having though.
What is Hulu?
And what is killing the birds your way? We've got imported pest and now the brown tree snake but no nuclear plants.
and Happy New year to you From Hawaii, We've got 13 hours to go
I'll need to stay home w/Max. He's already getting upset w/the bombs going off. He's sticking to me like glue. Poor dog.
Aren't you in the military?
hmm what a conundrum. Your a braver man then I am. I'd love to help but afraid to approach them. I'm thinking they'll get mad at me
Your one wild and crazy guy
Yeah I loved staying up all nite & talking & then we wld sneak out the window & go 2 the beach in the middle of the nite
It's the Museum for me tomorrow. Have not been there for two weeks. I hope I can remember my tour speach. Aloha
OK, I've way overdone my stay at this drugputer, I have to close shop or I'll never be able to stand up. My knees are locked into postion.
RT @Joan_W: For librarians it's an occupational hazard. Just watch out for the late fees! Oh I just say it's a contribution and I feel OK
Jason Thank you for following me. I saw those Bull Dogs and knew I had to follow you.
The view from my bedroom When it rains it pours http://twitpic.com/sod0
And here is where I am going to be in a few minutes if it does not stop raining http://twitpic.com/sob0 Time to get the broom.
boy there are some creeps out there. I had 10 views of the dolls before I finished the tag Naked.
And what fun would it be if you could not see the photos! of the the two http://twitpic.com/so97
RT @Joan_W: RT @FahimFarook Twitter Viral Experiment #TVE - Just retweet this message,after adding 1 to the number at the end(if it's 3 ...
The kids can take care of Max tonight. I'll just pet and love him. But I did the AM run. Ah, Max heard a stranger and has run to the door.
Max is curled up next to my chair.I'm sure he is waiting to go on a poop run. I'm waiting for CSI. The second part. Then I am going to sleep
RT @jefftippett: Drinking Blue Moon Drinking HOB NOB shiraz
Nico bringing in the new year. Now remember this is only 8pm by midnight it will be a total blackout.http://twitpic.com/ym1u
This is down the street blurry but the smoke is on targethttp://twitpic.com/ym1a
AT 8 PM the street was starting to smoke up This is what the street looked like from my bd rm windowhttp://twitpic.com/ym09
I have an apple lap top but I don't know what these cords are for can anyone tell me?http://twitpic.com/yig6
Happy New Year all, going to play new "Christmas story Monopoly" Might as well give book a go too.
"Purpose driven life"whats it about?at borders get book but C a game 50% off. Excited,I've coupons. get both.ugh, book is religious, I'm not
ive just realized that half my tweets R not showin up on tweetDeck. Is anyone else having that problem. ive 2 go 2 my twttr page 2 read.
